item.title: Comment by ben+00:00
item.description: I wrote a similar thing a while ago that ran on a thread and tested my webhost's webserver periodically. I amassed a bunch of data showing their server's uptime and downtime. I was constantly complaining that my site was down often, and they claimed it was "my code". By showing logs of their server's activity and also logs of the amount of times they restarted their servlet engine, I could prove that not only was it their fault that the server was down, but also that they were lying about how often they restarted the servlet engine.
